headline.main: POPE SEES NEW ORDER BASED ON 5 VICTORIES; First Is Conquering of Hatred and Cruelties It Provokes

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Feb. 2 -- Pope Pius is convinced that the world aspires to a new order, it was declared today by Pierre Cardinal Gerlier, Archbishop of Lyon, addressing a congregation in the Fourviere Basilica at Lyon after his recent visit to Rome.
snippet: VICHY, France, Feb. 2 -- Pope Pius is convinced that the world aspires to a new order, it was declared today by Pierre Cardinal Gerlier, Archbishop of Lyon, addressing a congregation in the Fourviere Basilica at Lyon after his recent visit to Rome...

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
